author: Reuters
title: London police arrest 276 climate change protesters
description: London's Metropolitan Police said on Monday it had so far arrested 267 people taking part in demonstrations organized by the climate change protest group Extinction Rebellion.
content:
London's Metropolitan Police said on Monday it had so far arrested 267 people taking part in demonstrations organized by the climate change protest group Extinction Rebellion.
Thousands of climate-change protesters took to the streets in cities around the wo… [+316 chars]
